page.title: 11CRAZIES HILL LEISURE SURVEY
page.content: {Playground Game:}Hopscotch is played by hopping on one foot and with it pushing a small stone over{scotches} which are lines marking out numbered squares.The Junior game is more difficult because they are not allowed to step on a line. {Favourite Indoor Games:} Table tennis Snakes and Ladders Great Britain Rail Journey Computer Games eg.Ghost Busters {Family Holidays:}most children spend a week family holiday away from home, a few spend 2 weeks away. {Accomodation:}26% self catering cottages,20% hotels,20% camp,12% guest house,6% each caravans & chalets and others go to stay with relations. {Favourite activities:}eating meals in a restaurant,swimming and beach games. A few families go abroad but not every year.
